extension.summary: Rough Tempo, WINNER OF BEST RADIO STATION - THE DRUM AND BASS AWARDS 2014 (Live video streaming)
extension.description: www.roughtempo.com Over 120 Hours a week of LIVE DJs from the UK and Worldwide with Multiple Cams, Chat and Huge name Special Guests Weekly.. [CR] PREVIOUS SPECIAL GUESTS INCLUDE: TC - ORIGINAL SIN - HEIST - KRAFTY KUTS - MODESTEP - DARREN STYLES - GAMMER - HAMILTON - LOGAN D - SDC - AYAH MARAR - APHRODITE - KENNY KEN - SLIPMATT - ELLIS DEE - RAGGA TWINS - BROCKIE - JUMPING JACK FROST - DEVIOUS D and MANY MORE!!
